long_description: The sleek and streamlined ERGObaby Performance Baby Carrier is light, durable and breathable-ideal for active moms and dads. Ergonomic fit offers comfort for both the wearer and the passenger. High quality buckles, tough webbing, reinforced stitching and ripstop fabric at critical points have been strength-tested to 90 lbs. (maximum recommended weight is 45 lbs.). Contoured shoulder straps and sliding chest strap easily adjust to accommodate wearers' body heights ranging from 5 to 6.5 ft.; waist belt adjusts to 48 in. Comfy sleeping hood adjusts to keep up with baby's growth. The ERGObaby Performance Baby Carrier features high-performance polyester/cotton shell fabric and soft mesh lining.
short_description: The sleek and streamlined ERGObaby Performance Baby Carrier is light, durable and breathable-ideal for active moms and dads.
